name: Track Suit
description: Go from working out to winding down in style. Contrast 3-Stripes run down the shoulders, sleeves and legs of this track suit. The jacket has a stand-up collar that adds to the retro look. The pants are cut in a modern tapered fit. Both pieces are made of recycled polyester plain weave for a smooth, soft feel.

name: Jacket
description: Build Your Casual Wardrobe With This Slim Fit Classic Zipper Jacket From Blackberrys Casuale .This Reversible Style Bomber Jacket Has A Fine Quality And Features Full Sleeves . Create A Sophisticated Style By Teaming This Jacket With Pair Of Chinos And Smart Shoes.

name: Men's Wallet
description: This compact wallet from our in-house label is crafted in a textured finish with one main compartment and multiple card slots. Max offers apparel, footwear and accessories for the entire family - women, men and children. Customers can expect a world-class shopping environment stocking the latest in international fashion from around the globe, as well as Max's own label of in-house designs in carefully chosen colour palettes. Pioneering the concept of ‘Latest fashion at great prices’ in India, Max is a leading fashion brand with Global presence in 19 countries. Max offer customers a one stop shop for clothing, accessories and footwear needs for the entire family and a vast choice with international fashion & quality.

name: Denim Jeans
description: These regular fit jeans offer plenty of modern style, ready to mix and match with anything in your wardrobe to lift your look. Whether you prefer to pair with a relaxed t-shirt or a smarter long sleeve shirt, these men’s jeans are a piece that will last y All of the cotton for our clothing is sustainably sourced and always will be.

name: Sunglass
description: Complete The Look snazzy with a brand new pair of aviator sunglasses from Pepe Jeans. This pair is a summer favourite and perfect for a day at the beach.
